subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Eddie Sutton became the fourth N.C.A.A. Division I coach to win 800 games as San Francisco came back from a 19-point second-half deficit to beat host Pepperdine, 85-82, on Saturday. Sutton joined a group that also includes Bob Knight, Dean Smith, Adolph Rupp and Jim Phelan. He trails only Knight among active coaches.
